en-US: We are also looking for feedbacks and suggestions to improve the app! If you have any ideas, please let us know! You can also support us by sharing this app with your friends! With the more users, we can get more feedbacks and improve the app better!
zh-CN: 我们也在寻找反馈和建议来改进应用程序。如果你有任何想法，请告诉我们！你也可以通过与朋友分享这个应用程序来支持我们！随着用户的增加，我们可以获得更多的反馈并更好地改进应用程序！
